content: I have several Caribbean Treasures 7.77 gram 999 silver Puerto Rico prototypes wallets funded with .0025 btc available. 50 pieces total were made but there is 5 different styles within the 50 pieces. Not to often you get a fully funded piece on precious metals with a mintage of under 10  Will be a nice deep stack piece. These were made to see the publics perception of different bitcoin denominations. As of right now and with future generations in mind,  Satoshi is preferred, especially as the price increase. Message below on the specific piece you want. There is several still available. I will message you with payment address and update the listing afterwards.PRICE IS 0.01 BTC EA Shipped Fully Funded within USA.  If you need other options just message me. Will ship to MJ if desired.
